#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
long long mul1( long long a, long long b,long long mod )
{
    long long result = 0;
    a %= mod;
    b %= mod;
    if ( a > b ) {long long int t;t=a;a=b;b=t;}
    while ( a )
    {
        if ( a % 2 )
        {
            result += b;
            if ( result >= mod ) result -= mod;
            a -= 1;
        }
        a /= 2;
        b += b;
        if ( b >= mod ) b -= mod;
    }
    return result;
}


int main()
{
 	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);cin.tie(0);
 	int t;ll n,b,res;
 	cin>>t;
 	while(t--)
 	{
 		cin>>n;cin>>b;res=1;
 		for (int i = 1; i <=n; i++) 
		{
        res =mul1(res, i,2*b);
 	    }
 	    if(res >= 0 && res < b) cout<<"Even\n";
 	    else      cout<<"Odd\n";
 	}
	return 0;
}
